abstract: Veganism is shedding its spartan, hippie image and becoming more glamorous as celebrities adopt lifestyle, fine vegan restaurants crop up and practitioners emphasize its sensual aspects; recipe for vegan Mexican cacao brownies given.
lead_paragraph: Proponents of a plant-based diet want to replace the spartan, dowdy vegan stereotypes of old with something sexier.
snippet: Proponents of a plant-based diet want to replace the spartan, dowdy vegan stereotypes of old with something sexier.

keywords.value: The Plantpower Way: Whole Food Plant-Based Recipes and Guidance for The Whole Family (Book)
keywords.name: creative_works
